mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ADVERTISEMENT ORDER BY ADVERTISE_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADVERTISEMENT ( ADVERTISE_SEQ, ADVERTISE_MONEY, ADVERTISE_FILE, ADVERTISER, ADVERTISER_PHONE, SITE, CONTRACT_PERIOD ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ADVERTISE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM ADVERTISEMENT), #{advertiseMoney}, #{advertiseFile}, #{advertiser}, #{advertiserPhone}, #{site}, #{contractPeriod} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ADVERTISEMENT SET ADVERTISE_MONEY = #{advertiseMoney} , ADVERTISE_FILE = #{advertiseFile}, ADVERTISER = #{advertiser}, ADVERTISER_PHONE = #{advertiserPhone}, SITE = #{site}, CONTRACT_PERIOD = #{contractPeriod} WHERE ADVERTISE_SEQ = #{advertiseSeq}
